title: Altcoins
description: Altcoin is an abbreviation of “Bitcoin alternative”.

props.body: Currently, the majority of altcoins are forks of Bitcoin with usually minor changes to the [Proof-of-work](/terms/proof-of-work) (POW) algorithm of the Bitcoin blockchain.
